name: Gargoyles
overview: Blast through 1,000 years of Gothic adventure with the stone-crushing strength of the legendary Goliath. Challenge armies of ancient Viking Warriors. Smash relentless hordes of 3-D robots in modern-day Manhattan. Your goal - to find and destroy the evil Eye of Odin before it destroys the world. - Come face to face with giant 3-D Raptorbots, Spiderbots, and vicious Waspbots. - Attack in mid-air, forcing your enemies into hand-to-hand aerial combat. - Scale mammoth towers of stone. Maneuver upside down as violent winds and enemies try to whip you down. - 24-megs of epic gameplay will push you to the wall across 18 stages of nonstop action.
